Waspada! Ada Potensi Gelombang Tinggi di Perairan NTB
03 Nov 2019, 11:28 by Harianto
Mataram - BMKG mengeluarkan peringatan dini potensi gelombang tinggi yang terjadi di perairan NTB. Diperkirakan tingginya lebih dari 2 meter.
Suhu permukaan laut di perairan NTB dan sekitarnya berkisar 28 derajat hingga 30 derajat Celcius dengan anomali suhu permukaan laut kurang 1 derajat hingga 0,5 derajat Celcius.
Angin permukaan di wilayah NTB bertiup dengan variasi arah dominan dari Timur ke Selatan dengan kecepatan angin maksimum mencapai 30 kilometer per jam. Kondisi tersebut mendukung pertumbuhan awan hujan di sebagian wilayah NTB.
"Diprakirakan awal musim hujan di Bulan November ini terjadi di Minggu ketiga," kata Prakirawan Stasiun Meteorologi Bandara Internasional Lombok, Herin Hutri Istyarini, Minggu (3/11/2019).
"Perlu diingat bahwa fase awal musim hujan biasanya terjadinya curah hujan rendah, tidak langsung tinggi," sambung Herin.
Berdasarkan kondisi itu, peringatan dini tinggi gelombang 2 meter berpotensi terjadi di Selat Lombok bagian Utara dan Selatan, Selat Alas bagian selatan, Perairan Selatan Sumbawa, Samudera Hindia Selatan NTB dan Selat Sape.
BMKG juga mberikan kriteria tingkat bahaya tinggi gelombang laut 1,25 - 2 meter berbahaya bagi perahu nelayan. Tinggi 2-3 meter, berbahaya bagi perahu belayan dan tongkang.
Sementara untuk ketinggian gelombang 3-4 meter akan berbahaya bagi perahu nelayan, tongkang dan ferry. Lebih tinggi dari 4 meter, berbahaya bagi semua kapal.

Alert! There is a High Wave Potential in NTB Waters
03 Nov 2019, 11:28 by Harianto
Mataram - BMKG issued an early warning of high wave potential that occurred in NTB waters. It is estimated that the height is more than 2 meters.
Sea surface temperature in the waters of NTB and its surroundings ranges from 28 degrees to 30 degrees Celsius with an anomaly of sea surface temperature of less than 1 degree to 0.5 degrees Celsius.
Surface winds in the NTB region blow with the dominant direction variation from East to South with a maximum wind speed reaching 30 kilometers per hour. These conditions support the growth of rain clouds in parts of NTB.
"It is predicted that the beginning of the rainy season in November will occur on the third Sunday," said the International Airport Airport Meteorological Prakirawan, Herin Hutri Istyarini, Sunday (3/11/2019).
"Keep in mind that the initial phase of the rainy season is usually the occurrence of low rainfall, not directly high," continued Herin.
Under these conditions, early warning of wave height of 2 meters has the potential to occur in the northern and southern Lombok Strait, southern Alas Strait, South Sumbawa waters, NTB South Indian Ocean and Sape Strait.
BMKG also provides criteria for the high hazard level of sea waves 1.25-2 meters dangerous for fishing boats. 2-3 meters high, dangerous for boat belongs and barges.
Meanwhile, the wave height of 3-4 meters will be dangerous for fishing boats, barges and ferries. Higher than 4 meters, dangerous for all ships.
